name: Misfit
description:
Misfit is a third person shooter, in which you battle over objectives, take down other players, fight waves of enemies, and survive until the portal opens for you to escape.

Features:

-fluid third person gameplay

-A multiplayer game you've never experienced before

-Wide variety of abilities such as Super Speed, Mega Jump, Grenade Launcher, and Giant Mech Armour

-Multiple maps to choose from, including ancient deserts, modern cities and medieval castles
